resource.chars:
(12) 
<u>October<\u> during the 9 first days. The rest 
of y<sup>e<\sup> Month was Cloudy, w<sup>th<\sup> now & then Hoar-
Frosts, & some Fair. The Winds varied often, 
but were the most frequent in <s>the<\s> some of y<sup>e<\sup> 
S<sup>ly<\sup> & W<sup>ly<\sup> Points, & not very high. 
In <u>November<\u> the Winds were some-
times in the W<sup>ly<\sup> & S<sup>ly<\sup> Points, but more fre-
quent in the N<sup>ly<\sup> & E<sup>ly<\sup>, for the most part of a 
moderate Strength. - The 9 first days, the 
Weather was cloudy. Then Snow & Frost to y<sup>e<\sup> 
17<sup>th<\sup>. Then to the end, Couldy, Snow, Hoar Frost, 
Rain, & but little Fair, & y<sup>t<\sup> in y<sup>e<\sup> Morning. 
In <u>December<\u> the Winds were moderate, 
& often in the S<sup>ly<\sup> & SW<sup>ly<\sup> Points, seldom N<sup>ly<\sup>. 
The 5 first days were Cloudy & Wet: then 
Snow & Frost the 6<sup>th<\sup>, 7<sup>th<\sup> & 8<sup>th<\sup>; then Cloudy to y<sup>w<\sup> 
13<sup>th<\sup>; then Hoar Frost, & Fair on 14<sup>th<\sup>, 15<sup>th<\sup> & 16<sup>th<\sup>; 
then Cloudy w<sup>th<\sup> Thunder, Rain, Snow & Frost, 
at divers times in the rest of y<sup>e<\sup> Month. 

jan <s>18<\s> 25 1732/3 
Entered. 
p<sup>r<\sup> in h<sup>0<\sup> 429. & correct-
ed there
